parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description:
Azure AI Computer Vision endpoint (protocol and hostname, for example:
https://<resource-name>.cognitiveservices.azure.com).

post.description: Performs a single Image Analysis operation

parameters.name: features
parameters.description:
A list of visual features to analyze.
Seven visual features are supported: Caption, DenseCaptions, Read (OCR), Tags, Objects, SmartCrops, and People.
At least one visual feature must be specified.

values.name: tags
values.description: Extract content tags for thousands of recognizable objects, living beings, scenery, and actions that appear in the image.

values.name: caption
values.description: Generate a human-readable caption sentence that describes the content of the image.

values.name: denseCaptions
values.description: Generate human-readable caption sentences for up to 10 different regions in the image, including one for the whole image.

values.name: objects
values.description: Object detection. This is similar to tags, but focused on detecting physical objects in the image and returning their location.

values.name: read
values.description: Extract printed or handwritten text from the image. Also known as Optical Character Recognition (OCR).

values.name: smartCrops
values.description: Find representative sub-regions of the image for thumbnail generation, at desired aspect ratios, with priority given to detected faces.

values.name: people
values.description: Detect people in the image and return their location.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
The desired language for result generation (a two-letter language code).
If this option is not specified, the default value 'en' is used (English).
See https://aka.ms/cv-languages for a list of supported languages.

parameters.name: gender-neutral-caption
parameters.description:
Boolean flag for enabling gender-neutral captioning for Caption and Dense Captions features.
By default captions may contain gender terms (for example: 'man', 'woman', or 'boy', 'girl'). 
If you set this to "true", those will be replaced with gender-neutral terms (for example: 'person' or 'child').

parameters.name: smartcrops-aspect-ratios
parameters.description:
A list of aspect ratios to use for smart cropping.
Aspect ratios are calculated by dividing the target crop width in pixels by the height in pixels.
Supported values are between 0.75 and 1.8 (inclusive).
If this parameter is not specified, the service will return one crop region with an aspect
ratio it sees fit between 0.5 and 2.0 (inclusive).

parameters.name: model-version
parameters.description:
The version of cloud AI-model used for analysis.
The format is the following: 'latest' (default value) or 'YYYY-MM-DD' or 'YYYY-MM-DD-preview', where 'YYYY', 'MM', 'DD' are the year, month and day associated with the model.
This is not commonly set, as the default always gives the latest AI model with recent improvements.
If however you would like to make sure analysis results do not change over time, set this value to a specific model version.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

parameters.name: features
parameters.description:

If this parameter is not specified, the service will return one crop region with an aspect
ratio it sees fit between 0.5 and 2.0 (inclusive).

parameters.description:

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

CaptionResult.description: Represents a generated phrase that describes the content of the whole image.

confidence.description:
A score, in the range of 0 to 1 (inclusive), representing the confidence that this description is accurate.
Higher values indicating higher confidence.

CropRegion.description:
A region at the desired aspect ratio that can be used as image thumbnail.
The region preserves as much content as possible from the analyzed image, with priority given to detected faces.

aspectRatio.description:
The aspect ratio of the crop region.
Aspect ratio is calculated by dividing the width of the region in pixels by its height in pixels.
The aspect ratio will be in the range 0.75 to 1.8 (inclusive) if provided by the developer during the analyze call.
Otherwise, it will be in the range 0.5 to 2.0 (inclusive).

boundingBox.description: The bounding box of the region.

DenseCaption.description: Represents a generated phrase that describes the content of the whole image or a region in the image

confidence.description:
A score, in the range of 0 to 1 (inclusive), representing the confidence that this description is accurate.
Higher values indicating higher confidence.

boundingBox.description: The image region of which this caption applies.

DenseCaptionsResult.description:
Represents a list of up to 10 image captions for different regions of the image.
The first caption always applies to the whole image.

DetectedObject.description: Represents a physical object detected in an image.

boundingBox.description: A rectangular boundary where the object was detected.

tags.description: A single-item list containing the object information.

DetectedPerson.description: Represents a person detected in an image.

boundingBox.description: A rectangular boundary where the person was detected.

confidence.description:
A score, in the range of 0 to 1 (inclusive), representing the confidence that this detection was accurate.
Higher values indicating higher confidence.

DetectedTag.description:
A content entity observation in the image. A tag can be a physical object, living being, scenery, or action
that appear in the image.

confidence.description:
A score, in the range of 0 to 1 (inclusive), representing the confidence that this entity was observed.
Higher values indicating higher confidence.

DetectedTextBlock.description: Represents a single block of detected text in the image.

lines.description: A list of text lines in this block.

DetectedTextLine.description: Represents a single line of text in the image.

text.description: Text content of the detected text line.

boundingPolygon.description: A bounding polygon around the text line. At the moment only quadrilaterals are supported (represented by 4 image points).

words.description: A list of words in this line.

DetectedTextWord.description:
A word object consisting of a contiguous sequence of characters. For non-space delimited languages,
such as Chinese, Japanese, and Korean, each character is represented as its own word.

boundingPolygon.description: A bounding polygon around the word. At the moment only quadrilaterals are supported (represented by 4 image points).

confidence.description: The level of confidence that the word was detected. Confidence scores span the range of 0.0 to 1.0 (inclusive), with higher values indicating a higher confidence of detection.

ImageAnalysisResult.description: Represents the outcome of an Image Analysis operation.

captionResult.description: The generated phrase that describes the content of the analyzed image.

denseCaptionsResult.description:
The up to 10 generated phrases, the first describing the content of the whole image,
and the others describing the content of different regions of the image.

metadata.description: Metadata associated with the analyzed image.

modelVersion.description: The cloud AI model used for the analysis

objectsResult.description: A list of detected physical objects in the analyzed image, and their location.

peopleResult.description: A list of detected people in the analyzed image, and their location.

readResult.description: The extracted printed and hand-written text in the analyze image. Also knows as OCR.

smartCropsResult.description:
A list of crop regions at the desired as aspect ratios (if provided) that can be used as image thumbnails.
These regions preserve as much content as possible from the analyzed image, with priority given to detected faces.

tagsResult.description: A list of content tags in the analyzed image.

ImageBoundingBox.description: A basic rectangle specifying a sub-region of the image.

x.description: X-coordinate of the top left point of the area, in pixels.

y.description: Y-coordinate of the top left point of the area, in pixels.

w.description: Width of the area, in pixels.

h.description: Height of the area, in pixels.

ImageMetadata.description: Metadata associated with the analyzed image.

height.description: The height of the image in pixels.

width.description: The width of the image in pixels.

ImagePoint.description: Represents the coordinates of a single pixel in the image.

x.description: The horizontal x-coordinate of this point, in pixels. Zero values corresponds to the left-most pixels in the image.

y.description: The vertical y-coordinate of this point, in pixels. Zero values corresponds to the top-most pixels in the image.

ImageUrl.description: An object holding the publicly reachable URL of an image to analyze.

url.description: Publicly reachable URL of an image to analyze.

ObjectsResult.description: Represents a list of physical object detected in an image and their location.

values.description: A list of physical object detected in an image and their location.

PeopleResult.description: Represents a list of people detected in an image and their location.

values.description: A list of people detected in an image and their location.

ReadResult.description: The results of a Read (OCR) operation.

blocks.description: A list of text blocks in the image. At the moment only one block is returned, containing all the text detected in the image.

SmartCropsResult.description:
Smart cropping result. A list of crop regions at the desired as aspect ratios (if provided) that can be used as image thumbnails.
These regions preserve as much content as possible from the analyzed image, with priority given to detected faces.

TagsResult.description:
A list of entities observed in the image. Tags can be physical objects, living being, scenery, or actions
that appear in the image.

Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.name: api-version
Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.description: The API version to use for this operation.
